WHAT IS THE GLOBAL BIOMECHANICS CONSORTIUM?

The Global Biomechanics Consortium, or GBC, is a mega-conglomerated corporation comprised of a vast number of companies and divisions dedicated to expanding the boundaries of genetic and biomechanic technologies.

No doubt best known for the breakthrough lung implant technology that halted the extermination of all mankind by the Plague Wind, the new life GBC provided humanity has also been radically improved by the development of bioroid technology, both for everyday and military applications.

The GBC also consists of many other divisions, however, many quite well-known in their own right. From names such as Gentech Pharmaceuticals and Right Aerospace Technologies to the more everyday Sky Breweries, the Global Biomechanics Consortium is dedicated to bringing the world the best that human ingenuity has to offer.

As per the Second Corporate/Civil Security and Control Act, the GBC is also very proud to claim uncontested governmental control over this sector and many others like it. Citizens can depend on the world-spanning resources at the disposal of the GBC to make their life safe, secure, and comfortable. Boasting the largest private and contracted security force in the world and a state-of-the-art intelligence network, the GBC can safely proclaim civil unrest a thing of the past. Citizens are now free to live a productive life under the protective wing of the GBC.

The Global Biomechanics Consortium, Better than Nature.

All companies mentioned above are entirely fictional. Any resemblance to real companies or organizations is purely coincidental.
